entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then clearing. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
